plot: It's Bill the Cat's one day off and all he wants to do is rest - a hard thing to accomplish when his neighbor, Tom the "Dawg", won't stop playing his musical instruments.
title: The Freak Next Door
plot_es: It's Bill the Cat's one day off and all he wants to do is rest - a hard thing to accomplish when his neighbor, Tom the "Dawg", won't stop playing his musical instruments.
plot_en: It's Bill the Cat's one day off and all he wants to do is rest - a hard thing to accomplish when his neighbor, Tom the "Dawg", won't stop playing his musical instruments.
